hero.title: PandaTrack: your command center for shopping and collectibles
hero.subtitle: Track stores, purchases, and shipments; keep your collection updated and save what you want on your wishlist. Everything in one place.
hero.featuresTitle: Everything you need at a glance

stores.title: Store database
stores.description: Save stores, prices, and favorite references.

purchases.title: Purchase tracking
purchases.description: Keep a clear history of your acquisitions.

collection.title: Collection management
collection.description: Organize, catalog, and value your collection.

wishlist.title: Smart wishlist
wishlist.description: Never lose sight of the pieces you want.

image.title: PandaTrack overview
image.description: A featured image of the app with metrics, collections, and shipments will live here.
